p: In vitro inhibition of enzymes involved in degradation of carbohydrates shows that M. viridis essential oil exhibits important inhibitory effect against α-Amylase (IC50 = 101.72 ± 1.86 μg/mL) and α-Glucosidase (IC50 = 86.93 ± 2.43 μg/mL) [ 20]. Moreover, these authors reported a derma-protective activity of M. viridis essential oil due to inhibition of the enzymes tyrosinase (IC50 = 55.13 ± 1.01 μg/mL) and elastase (IC50 = 114.24 ± 1.22 μg/mL).
